Name: brent777
AboutMe:
I have been a developer for about 9 and a half years now (4 at university and 5 and a half thereafter). I have experience in Java, C++ and Delphi among other things.

I am currently a web developer using technologies such as GWT, Spring, MySQL, Hibernate, Hibernate Search, XMPP / Jabber, GWT i18n and comet (server-push). I also have experience in Jasper, Oracle, Struts, Spring Roo and all the usual Java web stuff (JSPs, Servlets, etc).

My interests include computer graphics and AI development. Currently I am also heavily involved in Android game development as my primary "development hobby".

I have a BSc degree majoring in both Mathematics and Computer Science and I also have an honours degree in Computer Science (both from the University of Cape Town).
